channel.title: Sonic the Heghog FM - (game over lol)
channel.description:
![image|690x345](upload://64VEGhBw1yEjsXaelMOLopE89Jp.jpeg) #
[color=hotpink]Sonic the Heghog FM[/color]
## `Rules` * Follow the [Global Forum/Discord/Game/Meta Rules - Please Read First](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244), the [Official Forum Mafia and Forum of Lies Rules](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926), https://www.mafiauniverse.com/forums/threads/27-Forum-Rules?p=2009&viewfull=1#post2009, and https://www.mafiauniverse.com/forums/threads/29704-Partner-Community-Guidelines. Please make sure you have enough time for this game before you sign up. * Due to the nature of this game, alts are kind of pointless? If you *really* want to you can do so ig. Just let us know who you are privately. * ***You are not allowed to blame the host for bad flavor.*** * Signups will be held in this thread, but the game itself will be on [Mafia Universe](https://www.mafiauniverse.com/forums/). It is REQUIRED to have an MU account to signup for this game. - **Breaking any MU rules in this subforum will be considered a rulebreak on FoL.** - **People who are sign-up blacklisted on FoL may not join games in this subforum.** ## `Gameplay` * **SOD/EOD:** 11 AM EST * **Phase Lengths:** 48/24 * **Minimum Posting Requirement (per phase):** 15 * **Execution:** Majority (starting D2) + Plurality (no vote is valid option) * **Factional:** Factional kills are compulsive. If mafia does not choose a player to factional, it will be randed amongst living non-mafia players. The factional kill is assigned. ## `Setup` * Closed * https://www.mafiauniverse.com/forums/threads/4062-Modbot-Supported-Roles-Modifiers * Anything that's achievable through automatic modbot may be in the setup. * Linked thread has all necessary role information so that you can get an idea of what's up. ## `Signups` 1. SirDerpsAlot 2. WindwardAway 3. Marluxion 4. Tilgarial 5. GGhana 6. sulit 7. lol 8. WazzaAzza 9. Chloe 10. min 11. an_gorta_pratai 12. Marshal 13. TrustworthyLiberal ## `Backups` 1. ATNoName 2. 3. ## `Spectators` 1. Jane 2. Icibalus 3. Arete 4. astand 5. Mistyx 6. DatBird 7. Nightingale 8. KyoDaz 9. EliThePsycho 10. that one bird from new york city 11. nutella 12. 13. > **Wisdom of the mod will be used in this game, if deemed necessary. We wish to ensure that the game is healthy, while also introducing multiple players to the new website. All decisions are final.**
